value:
The light of one's heart can illuminate
darkness, cleanse the mind of doubt,
and ease suffering.

The Demon Dragon's spawn, the war
dragons, proved a great threat. So we
eight marched upon their stronghold.

Our victory over the Demon Dragon
was possible only with our sacred
weapons and many great sacrifices.

The dragons were not fully broken by
weapons. It was bonds between
hearts that enabled the killing blow.

It is true that we defeated the Demon
Dragon. Yet it was not destroyed...
Hartmut's kindness saved it.

A bond between hearts is a testament
to strength. I pray your bond with
$Nf is eternal.

The seven affinities were a gift from
God. If we strengthen our bonds,
those affinities can shine.

Our hearts are weak alone. We must
have guidance to forge the proper
bonds that will make us strong.

Never forget that dragons are but
destruction given form. Our sacred
weapons are our only defense.

Let us be one with the light that
would pierce the Demon Dragon's
darkness.

I am Elimine. Accept my guidance and
be one with the light that heals your
neighbor and extinguishes demons.

The hearts of men are weak and
feelings are fleeting. The eight of
us were no different.$k$pAll pray for peace. But who will build
that peace? And who will protect it?$k$pAfter we sealed the dragon, we faced
a terrible trial... Endless icy darkness.
It must never happen again.$k$pOne man's kindness was enough to
sow discord, to weaken our chain...
Our bonds must be as hard as iron.$k$pWe must face the danger the dragons
pose with eyes unclouded, united
in our opposition to their threat.$k$pOf all, you must understand what it
is I seek. Let us play our parts until
the end, $Nu.
はっ
神よ…
ああっ…
力が…
Stand down.
Light above!
I will protect you.
The wicked will perish.
I go to God...
Hehe...
May God bless us all.
There is always a light.
My name is Elimine. I am a servant of God.
I am the last goddess to descend upon the land... Is that truly what people say?
Instead of intervening directly in their affairs, God chooses to believe in people.
The dragons must never return. They would bring calamity.
I pray that God will grace you with good fortune.
Speak.
Hm...
I will go.
